seo_keywords: Rainbow vacuum power nozzle not working

problems.title: Bad Smell / Musty Odor
problems.description: Vacuum smells like mildew even with fresh water.
solution_steps: Remove the back cover and replace the HEPA Neutralizer filter (needs changing every 2 years).
Remove the separator nut (under the unit) and clean the spider assembly.
Always dry the basin after use.

problems.title: Power Nozzle Brush Not Spinning
solution_steps: Unplug and remove the bottom plate of the power head.
Check the belt. If stretched or snapped, replace it.

faqs.question: Is it worth fixing the issue on a SRX / E2 Type 12 Black?
faqs.answer: Yes. A replacement part typically costs significantly less than a new $424 vacuum, and extending the life of your Rainbow is eco-friendly.

faqs.question: How do I know if my SRX / E2 Type 12 Black needs a new part?
faqs.answer: Common signs include intermittent power and the device failing to complete a cleaning cycle.

faqs.question: Can I replace the part on my SRX / E2 Type 12 Black myself?
faqs.answer: Yes, this is a user-serviceable repair. Most replacements generally require just a screwdriver and about 10-20 minutes of time.
